content.rendered: Keith is an innovative IT Engineer with 8 years of experience in managing all aspects of the IT department, supporting clients and managing IT processes. He received his Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology Engineering in 2010 and started his career in UAE working for Arabian construction Co and Dubai Properties in 2011. He has been suggesting improvements in the operations and processes to make the systems reliable and also participated in project activities to support infrastructure and application projects.
